mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS recNum,LVL,articleNO, parentNO, title, content, id, writtenDate, likeCount, imageFileName FROM ( SELECT LEVEL AS LVL, articleNO, parentNO, title, content, id, writtenDate, likeCount, imageFileName FROM p_board START WITH parentNO=0 CONNECT BY PRIOR articleNO=parentNO ORDER SIBLINGS BY articleNO DESC ) ) WHERE recNum between 1+10*(#{page}-1) and #{perPageNum}*#{page}
mapper.insert:
